tool_description: Natural Language API provides natural language understanding technologies to developers, including sentiment analysis, entity analysis, entity sentiment analysis, content classification, and syntax analysis.
name: TextAnalysisAPI
title: TextAnalysisAPI

api_list.name: Similarity
api_list.description: Returns phrases related to the provided unigram, or bigram.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textanalysisapi.p.rapidapi.com/proxy/qaapi/get-similar/dog"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textanalysisapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://textanalysisapi.p.rapidapi.com/proxy/qaapi/get-similar/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textanalysisapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
